channel.title: Talent Is Enduring Patience
channel.description: Recent content on Talent Is Enduring Patience

item.description: https://gojustfor.fun/post/using-hugo-github-and-github-action-to-build-blog/+++ title = ‘My First Post’ date = 2024-10-19T22:28:08+08:00 draft = true +++
夏殇2012 终于要结束这段困苦了，想想人还是要忙起来的好，要充实！要不然会迅速的堕落迷失自我！ 曾几何时，听着他人面对当前愁苦如那个西楚霸王在
第一次成功搭建Hugo+GitHub 1，通过 https://lillianwho.com 对搭建博客有了兴趣！ 2，全程 copy https://gojustfor.fun/post/using-hugo-github-and-github-action-to-build-blog/ ​ 失败了好多次，就在要放弃的时候成功了！ ​ 从来不输代码的人，没
